This is a Flutter project for a Merchant NFT Receipt system. Use Dart and Flutter best practices. The app should include:
- NFT receipt management
- AI avatar generation
- Dynamic NFT evolution
- Wallet connection (web3dart, etc.)
- Firebase integration
- IPFS/web3.storage support
- Material Design UI

Scaffold main screens: Dashboard, NFTReceiptManager, AIAvatarGenerator, DynamicNFTEvolution, WalletConnect.

Use Provider, Riverpod, or Bloc for state management. Use pub.dev packages for blockchain, Firebase, and storage integrations.
